item.title: Complex relational App by, ReactJS + Firestore + ServerLess
item.description: Introduction As the need of serverless app group, client side have to deal with relational data either sql or nosql. i try to find best practice, but there is no good tutorial for complex relational nosql handle method which is needed by firestore/firebase to handle all data only by it. Problem we assume backend support by firestore to achieve server-less. Manage Relational data with Server-less application is painful.
